title: Unanticipated decrease in AD affects unemp, infl

content.question: An unanticipated decrease in aggregate demand will most likely cause the unemployment rate and the inflation rate to change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Unemployment Rate Inflation Rate Increase Increase
Unemployment Rate Inflation Rate Increase Decrease
Unemployment Rate Inflation Rate Increase No change
Unemployment Rate Inflation Rate Decrease Increase
Unemployment Rate Inflation Rate Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Unemployment Rate Inflation Rate Increase Decrease

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
